# 𓍜

ma.shoulder

𓅓 𓈙 𓂝 𓏏 𓈎 𓍜 | shoulder (blade) | ⲙⲟⲩⲧ moⲩt •murdj 𒈱 murgu₂ ( ⲟ ⋍ σ ) (𓂝 ≈ L Elle )

𒈱 murgu₂ •murdj ⲙⲟⲩⲧ mout ⲙⲟϯ moti "shoulder"

𓍜 (shoulder) blade 𒁍𒁺 pu-du •blade
𓍜 shoulder (blade) 𒁍𒁺 pu-du плечо plečo плешка pleška épaule spatule spart (s)páthē
